titleStmt.title: The man Christ Jesus, the head of the church and true mediator, in opposition to the papist head, their pope prayers to & for the dead, their shav'd crowns and saints relicks and purgatory disproved to be Christian or Judaism, consequently heathenish or pagan by Scripture-testimony / by George Fox.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
